name: Darkman (itch)
description:
Ludum Dare Entry Page

Darkness... Impenetrable darkness. Why you're here? It's quite simple. This world doesn't have enough resources for more than one person. It's you, or that pity of a person, your neighbour... May his life be as pleaseant as he is. This means war!

In Darkman you take role of unusual inhabitant, who will fight for his place to live. Take place in stealth packed strategy game, where darkness hides every silent move, and loudness makes you vulnerable. Take your opponents life for sake of your own good.
